column3: I'd prefer to make it deterministic
They are not deterministic because `SaltedOutpointHasher` is not deterministic
...which uses GetRand(), so setting `g_mock_deterministic_tests=true` should make the test deterministic.
Oh, I forgot that I already added that mock flag in fae169c95e09ddf068dcaebc8170c4f41b02cf66.\n\nYeah, so should be trivial to make it deterministic. Closing this pull request.
